name: capstone-project-3900-w18a-to-the-moon
description: A stock portfolio management web app built by UNSW students as part of the Capstone Project course COMP3900.

scripts.build: npm run build-frontend && npm run build-backend
scripts.build-frontend: cd frontend && npm i && npm run build && npm i -g serve
scripts.start: concurrently "serve -s -l 3000 frontend/build" "cd backend/src && FLASK_APP=server.py FLASK_ENV="production" flask run --port=5000"

author: To The Moon
